title: Add pagination for large result sets
description: Implement cursor-based or offset pagination for tools that return large lists: list_children (recursive mode), find_nodes, list_node_types, get_parameter_schema (all params mode). This prevents memory issues and allows clients to fetch results incrementally.

title: Add compact mode to list_children
description: Similar to get_node_info, add a compact mode option to list_children that omits detailed input connection info and returns only essential fields (path, name, type) for faster responses on large node networks.

title: Material creation and assignment tools
description:
Add tools for creating and applying materials to geometry:

- create_material(material_type, name, parent_path): Create Principled Shader or other material types
- set_material(node_path, material_path): Apply material to geometry via Material SOP
- get_material_info(material_path): Get material parameters and textures

Should handle both /mat and /shop contexts. Support common material types like principledshader, mtlxstandard_surface.

comments.author: node
comments.text:
Implement get_geo_summary(node_path) that returns:

- Point count
- Primitive count
- Vertex count
- Bounding box
- Attribute list (point, prim, vertex, detail) with types
- Group list (point groups, prim groups)

Useful for verifying results after operations.

Huly Issue: HDMCP-9

title: Houdini help documentation integration
description:
Add tool to query SideFX Houdini documentation for nodes, VEX functions, and Python API.

get_houdini_help(help_type, item_name):
- help_type: 'sop', 'obj', 'vex_function', 'python_hou', etc.
- item_name: node or function name

Scrapes docs from sidefx.com/docs/houdini/ and returns structured help content including title, description, parameters, and examples.

Helps AI understand Houdini concepts without hallucinating parameter names.

title: Viewport rendering tools (render_view, render_camera)
description:
Add tools to render the Houdini viewport and return images as base64. Includes:
- render_single_view: Render from a specified angle/rotation
- render_quad_view: Render front/back/left/right/top views
- render_specific_camera: Render from a specific camera node

Returns base64-encoded image data for AI vision analysis. Supports OpenGL and optionally Karma rendering.

title: Expose compact mode on get_node_info
description: Add a 'compact' parameter to get_node_info in server.py that returns minimal fields (path, type, name) to reduce payload size for large scenes. The internal implementation already exists in tools.py.

comments.author: node

Implement get_parameter_schema(node_path, parm_name?) that returns:

- Parameter types (float, int, string, menu, ramp, etc.)
- Default values
- Min/max ranges
- Menu items for menu parameters
- Conditional visibility rules if available

This helps agents set valid parameter values without guessing.

title: Node wiring tools: connect, disconnect, flags

comments.author: node
comments.text:
Implement tools for wiring nodes together:

**connect_nodes(src_path, dst_path, dst_input_index, output_index)**

- Wire output of src to input of dst
- Support multi-input nodes

**disconnect_node_input(node_path, input_index)**

- Break a specific input connection

**set_node_flags(node_path, display, render, current)**

- Set display/render/current flags on nodes

**reorder_inputs(node_path, new_order)**

- Reorder inputs for merge-style nodes

This is Priority 2 - enables augmenting existing SOP chains.

- **Output size cap**: Limit stdout/stderr to prevent massive returns
- **Diff size limit**: Cap scene diff output
- **Timeout**: Add execution timeout (configurable)

Huly Issue: HDMCP-11

title: Response size warnings and limits
description: Add configurable response size limits with warnings: warn when response exceeds threshold (e.g., 100KB), optionally truncate or error on very large responses, add response_size_bytes field to tool responses for monitoring, consider compression for large payloads.

title: Find all error nodes in scene
description:
Add ability to scan entire scene for nodes with errors/warnings without specifying a path.

Current get_node_info with include_errors=True requires a specific node path. New feature:
- find_error_nodes(root_path='/') - returns all nodes with cook errors
- find_warning_nodes(root_path='/') - returns all nodes with warnings
- Or extend existing tools with a scan mode

Essential for debugging complex scenes where error location is unknown.

comments.author: node
comments.text:
Create example showing common SOP workflow:

1. Create sphere
2. Add transform node
3. Add color node
4. Create null OUT node
5. Wire: sphere -> xform -> color -> OUT
6. Set display flag on OUT

Document in README:

- Tool reference
- Common patterns
- Error handling
- Integration test examples

title: Node layout and organization tools
description:
Add tools to organize node networks:

- layout_children(node_path): Auto-layout child nodes (calls layoutChildren())
- create_network_box(node_path, nodes, label, color): Group nodes in a network box
- set_node_color(node_path, color): Set node display color
- set_node_position(node_path, x, y): Position node in network editor

Helps maintain clean, organized node networks during AI-assisted scene building.
